titleStmt.title: A short appendix to a late treatise concerning abatement of usury by the same author.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Thomas, Sir, 1626-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Leach for Christopher Wilkinson ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Culpeper the younger by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
